messages.subject: ART- Monet
messages.msgSnippet: I found a cute video at the library: Linnea in Monet s Garden.  A little girl and her friend go to France to visit Monet s garden.  It is mostly gentle cartoon
messages.messageBody:
I found a cute video at the library: Linnea in Monet's Garden. A little
girl and her friend go to France to visit Monet's garden. It is mostly
gentle cartoon with some photography of Monet and his garden, plus his
paintings. My dd really enjoyed it. Then we looked at some of his
paintings in an art book we have.
Mary Ellen
Seek joy in what you give, not in what you get.
